tool_description:
This API allows you to retrieve information about a specific pin on Pinterest. You can use it to retrieve details such as the pin’s title, description, image, video, gif, reel. With the Pinterest Downloader API, you can easily access and leverage the wealth of information available on Pinterest.

telegram DM: https://t.me/justmobicode
name: Pinterest Downloader - Download Pinterest image Video and reels
title: Pinterest Downloader - Download Pinterest image Video and reels
tool_name: Pinterest Downloader - Download Pinterest image Video and reels

api_list.name: Pinterest pin keyword search
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back images or videos about a specific keyword on Pinterest.

api_list.name: Get Pin Data
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all information about a specific pin on Pinterest.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description:
use pin url: https://pin.it/1JyKAWz
or https://www.pinterest.com/pin/898608931881203244/
or 898608931881203244

api_list.name: Get Pin Data V2
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all information about a specific pin on Pinterest.
